attributes.additional_details:
in Britain the death rate caused from smoking is High
(31.0 according to one website) and another website states that Lung cancer is the leading cause of cancer deaths in both men and women in the United States and worldwide.
now consider the fact that this is meant to be a Christian nation...the adhering to Christian Principles acts as a protection but sadly cause the putting of profit before principle has become the norm in most nations This is why lung cancer is so prevalent
and the Current government are adamant that to allow that to continue in effect is acceptable
but is it?

rejection.details: Please see: All out ban on smoking
